welcome_message_body: Welcome to Comstock Park, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the wonderful sights and experiences it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Park Township Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Park Township Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Muskegon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
